attributes.action: Change the way that CMS calculates and grants child maintenance.
attributes.additional_details:
One of the factors taken to the account by CMS is the time child spends with a paying parent. It is very easy for receiving parent to get more money and affect child live routine, only by reduce, control and manipulate the time that child spends with paying parent.
To solve this issue both parents must agree and communicate with CMS about the time that child spends with them. Or a receiving parent must provide an evidence if/why does not agree for the child to spend the time with paying parent
attributes.background: The way CMS calculates and grants child maintenance gives perfect and unfortunately fully legal oportunity to greedy (receiving) parents to manipulate and to control the time that child is allowed to spend with other (paying) parent. This affects the child and paying parent relations and lives.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Change the way that CMS calculates and grants child maintenance."

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
